title: I think someone has done this b4
body: I have played quite a few pvp matches but for some reason every so often I die and a mask appears. I normally play Garen and they have Ashe or sejuani then someone, any of their characters (last time it was lee sin) kills me. I don't have a image, but it seems like a kindred mask or marauder ashe mark flying above me. Does anyone know what happened.THX

replies.body: All it is, is an easter egg for the upcoming champion, Kindred. I'd happens randomly upon death, so it could happen on any champion, with any champion killing you.  Hope I helped.
what do you wont me t do master
no nobody has done this before and this has never happened before. i suggest deleting syste- i mean.....fixing your internet.....
